import Mathlib

  [FiniteDimensional â„ E] {U : Set E} (f : E â†’ â„) (hU : Convex â„ U)
  (hcont : ContDiffOn â„ 2 f U) (hH : ContinuousOn (iteratedFDeriv â„ 2 f) U) :
  âˆ€ (K : Set E), IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
    âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, âˆ€ y âˆˆ K, â€–y - xâ€– < Î´ â†’
      |f y - f x - (fderiv â„ f x : E â†’L[â„] â„) (y - x) - (1 / 2 : â„) * (iteratedFDeriv â„ 2 f x) (y - x, y - x)| â‰¤ Îµ * â€–y - xâ€– ^ 2 :=

import Mathlib

open Set

theorem second_order_taylor_uniform_on_compact {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E]
  [FiniteDimensional â„ E] {U : Set E} (f : E â†’ â„) (hU : Convex â„ U)
  (hcont : ContDiffOn â„ 2 f U) (hH : ContinuousOn (iteratedFDeriv â„ 2 f) U) :
  âˆ€ (K : Set E), IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
    âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, âˆ€ y âˆˆ K, â€–y - xâ€– < Î´ â†’
      |f y - f x - (fderiv â„ f x : E â†’L[â„] â„) (y - x) - (1 / 2 : â„) * (iteratedFDeriv â„ 2 f x) (fun _ : Fin 2 => y - x)| â‰¤ Îµ * â€–y - xâ€– ^ 2 :=
